flowviewparam.val: HtmlViewAssignor::buildSetAttribute('src', getConfig('BASE_URL', Flow::$params['get']['target_project']).str_replace('=', '/', str_replace('_', '.', Flow::$params['get']['target_url'])).'?access_token='.AccessTokenAuth::generate(Auth::getCertifiedUser()->permission, false, null, null, Flow::$params['get']['target_project']))
